Description: The technical specifications to refer when using the package. Easy-going, offline supported (via web PWA installation), and detailed oriented. Courtesy from ZORALab's Hestia.

Designs.Description: This component was designed by the following creators:
Designs.Title: Designers

Designs.Description:
This component has the following dependencies (arranged in the order from
left-top to right-bottom):
Designs.Title: Dependencies

Designs.Description:
For HTML, ZORALab's Hestia employs the W3C native syntax for simplicity and
maximum compatibility sakes. ZORALab's Hestia recommends the following HTML code
structure for this component.
Designs.Title: HTML

Designs.Description: The minimum required HTML codes are shown below:
Designs.Title: Minimum HTML

Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --code-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --code-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --code-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --code-border-radius
CSS PROPERTY : border-radius
DEFAULT      : .4rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border radius of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border Radius

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --code-font-weight
CSS PROPERTY : font-weight
DEFAULT      : 700 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the font weight of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Font Weight

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --code-letter-spacing
CSS PROPERTY : letter-spacing
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the letter spacing of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Letter Spacing

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --code-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-300) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --code-color-inverted
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-200) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component in inverted mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Inverted)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --code-color-print
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component during print mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --code-overflow-wrap
CSS PROPERTY : overflow-wrap
DEFAULT      : break-word (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the overflow wrapping behavior of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Overflow Wrap

Designs.Description: Fortunately, this component does not use any JavaScript. Relax.
Designs.Title: JavaScript

Functions.Description: Render the CSS output for this UI component.
Functions.Title: ToCSS

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package's primary purpose is to provide user interface (UI) styling
specifically for inline code based values.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Main Purpose

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package was known as 'code_hestiaUI' before ZORALab's Hestia 'v1.2.0'. The
transformation was due to someone attempting to steal the design copyrights and
makes way for programming package's documentation restructuring.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Legacy Recording

Title: zoralabCODE Technical Specification - ZORALab's Hestia
